QuestData.Title: Gal'darah Must Pay
QuestData.Description: Da mighty Akali has been slain, $r.$b$bMy role in life be to record, not fight. But dis cannot stand! Gal'darah and his followers must pay!$b$bAvenge Akali's death, mon. It be da right thing ta do.
QuestData.LogDescription: Chronicler Bah'Kini wants you to slay Slad'ran, Moorabi, and Gal'darah in Gundrak.
